description.name: Diamond hole saw 82mm
description.long_desc:
Tvardy offers a high-quality diamond core drill bit designed for precise drilling in tough materials such as concrete. This reliable tool is perfect for professionals in the construction and renovation industries who value durability and efficiency.


Performance and Precision: The laser-welded diamond coating and five robust segments ensure fast, clean cutting even in the hardest materials.
Durability: Its alloy steel construction and wear-resistant design provide long-lasting performance and resistance to deformation during intensive use.
Versatility: With an M14 thread and SDS+ shank, this core drill bit is compatible with most standard drills and rotary hammers, making it easy to use across various tasks.


Technical Specifications:



  • Brand: Tvardy

  • Model: Diamond Core Drill Bit – Segmental Design

  • Material: Alloy steel, diamond coating

  • Thread: M14

  • Number of Segments: 5, laser-welded

  • Diameter: 82 mm

  • Height: 75 mm

  • Shank: SDS+

  • Resistance: Wear-resistant and deformation-proof


Example Applications:
Drilling holes for installation boxes in concrete, aerated concrete, cement board, and brick.Professional construction and renovation tasks.

description.name: Diamond crown drill bit 42x10x450mm 3T 1.1/4"
description.long_desc:
Diamond Core Drill Bit 42x10x450mm 1-1/4" – Versatility and Efficiency in the Toughest Conditions


The diamond core drill bit 42x10x450mm is a professional tool designed for precise drilling both wet and dry. Thanks to advanced diamond segment technology and a robust construction, this drill bit performs exceptionally well in the most challenging work conditions, ensuring fast and efficient drilling in concrete, brick, stone, and other construction materials.


Technical Specifications:



  • Diameter: 42 mm

  • Working Length: 450 mm

  • Diamond Segment Height: 10 mm

  • Thread Connection: 1-1/4”

  • Number of Segments: 3 pcs

  • Operation: Wet and dry


*For extended tool life, wet drilling is recommended.


Features and Benefits:



  • Versatile Use – Suitable for both wet and dry drilling, providing flexibility in various construction environments.

  • High-Quality Diamond Segments – The 10 mm diamond coating ensures long service life and efficient cutting, even in the hardest materials.

  • Precision and Performance – The optimized segment layout minimizes friction and ensures clean holes without excessive overheating.

  • Robust Construction – Made from durable materials, increasing resistance to mechanical stress and intensive use.

  • Standard 1-1/4" Thread – Compatible with a wide range of professional diamond drilling machines.

  • 450 mm Working Length – Ideal for deep drilling in concrete and structural materials.


Applications:



  • Drilling in reinforced and non-reinforced concrete

  • Installation and construction work

  • Holes for electrical and plumbing installations

  • Drilling in brick, stone, concrete blocks, and other construction materials

Koronowa Otwornica Diamentowa 182x10x450mm 1,1/4" – Wszechstronność i wydajność w najtrudniejszych warunkach

Koronowa otwornica diamentowa 182x10x450mm to profesjonalne narzędzie zaprojektowane do precyzyjnego wiercenia zarówno na mokro, jak i na sucho. Dzięki zaawansowanej technologii diamentowego nasypu oraz solidnej konstrukcji, otwornica doskonale sprawdza się w najtrudniejszych warunkach pracy, zapewniając szybkie i efektywne wiercenie w betonie, cegle, kamieniu oraz innych materiałach budowlanych.

Specyfikacja techniczna:

Średnica: 182 mm

Długość robocza: 450 mm

Wysokość nasypu diamentowego: 10 mm

Gwint przyłączeniowy: 1,1/4”

Ilość segmentów: 16 szt.

Praca: na mokro i na sucho

*Dla dłuższej żywotności narzędzia zaleca się wykonywanie wiercenia na mokro

Cechy i Zalety:

  • Wszechstronność użytkowania – możliwość pracy zarówno na mokro, jak i na sucho zapewnia elastyczność w różnych warunkach budowlanych.
  • Wysokiej jakości segmenty diamentowe – nasyp o wysokości 10 mm gwarantuje długą żywotność i skuteczne cięcie nawet w najtwardszych materiałach.
  • Precyzja i wydajność – zoptymalizowany układ segmentów minimalizuje tarcie i zapewnia czyste otwory bez nadmiernego przegrzewania narzędzia.
  • Solidna konstrukcja – wykonana z wytrzymałych materiałów, które zwiększają odporność na obciążenia mechaniczne i intensywne użytkowanie.
  • Standardowy gwint 1,1/4" – kompatybilność z szeroką gamą profesjonalnych wiertnic diamentowych.
  • Długość robocza 450 mm – idealna do głębokiego wiercenia w betonie i materiałach konstrukcyjnych.

Zastosowanie:

  • Wiercenie w betonie zbrojonym i niezbrojonym
  • Prace instalacyjne i budowlane
  • Otwory pod instalacje elektryczne i hydrauliczne
  • Wiercenie w cegle, kamieniu, bloczkach betonowych i innych mataeriałach budowlanych

description.name: Diamond crown drill bit 202x10x450mm 17T 1.1/4"
description.long_desc:
Diamond Core Drill Bit 202x10x450mm 1-1/4" – Versatility and Efficiency in the Toughest Conditions


The diamond core drill bit 202x10x450mm is a professional tool designed for precise drilling both wet and dry. Thanks to advanced diamond segment technology and a robust construction, this drill bit performs exceptionally well in the most challenging work conditions, ensuring fast and efficient drilling in concrete, brick, stone, and other construction materials.


Technical Specifications:



  • Diameter: 202 mm

  • Working Length: 450 mm

  • Diamond Segment Height: 10 mm

  • Thread Connection: 1-1/4”

  • Number of Segments: 17 pcs

  • Operation: Wet and dry


*For extended tool life, wet drilling is recommended.


Features and Benefits:



  • Versatile Use – Suitable for both wet and dry drilling, providing flexibility in various construction environments.

  • High-Quality Diamond Segments – The 10 mm diamond coating ensures long service life and efficient cutting, even in the hardest materials.

  • Precision and Performance – The optimized segment layout minimizes friction and ensures clean holes without excessive overheating.

  • Robust Construction – Made from durable materials, increasing resistance to mechanical stress and intensive use.

  • Standard 1-1/4" Thread – Compatible with a wide range of professional diamond drilling machines.

  • 450 mm Working Length – Ideal for deep drilling in concrete and structural materials.


Applications:



  • Drilling in reinforced and non-reinforced concrete

  • Installation and construction work

  • Holes for electrical and plumbing installations

  • Drilling in brick, stone, concrete blocks, and other construction materials

description.name: Diamond crown drill bit extension 20cm 1.1/4"
description.long_desc:
Extension for Diamond Core Drill Bits 20cm 1-1/4" – Greater Depth, Greater Possibilities


The 20 cm professional extension for diamond core drill bits is an essential accessory for specialists drilling in concrete, brick, and other construction materials. With its solid construction and standard 1-1/4" thread, this extension ensures compatibility with most drilling machines and core drill bits, allowing for deeper drilling without the need for additional tools.


Technical Specifications:



  • Length: 20 cm

  • Mounting Thread: 1-1/4"

  • Operation: Wet and dry


Features and Benefits:


Increased Drilling Depth – The 200 mm extension allows for deeper hole drilling without losing stability.


Durable and Sturdy Construction – Made from high-quality materials, resistant to intensive use and high loads.


Standard 1-1/4" Thread – Fully compatible with diamond core drill bits and drilling machines available on the market.


Precise Fit – Ensures stable connection, minimizing vibrations and preventing accuracy loss during drilling.


Easy Installation and Removal – Quick and convenient setup, enabling efficient work in challenging construction conditions.


Applications:



  • Deep hole drilling in concrete, stone, etc.

  • Plumbing, ventilation, and electrical installations

  • Construction work requiring precise drilling

description.name: Laser level cross 360° 4D + accessories
description.long_desc:
The Geko 4D Laser Level is an advanced measuring tool designed for precise determination of horizontal, vertical, and angled lines within a 360° range. With 4 planes (2 horizontal and 2 vertical) and 16 laser lines, it enables simultaneous display of lines in various directions, significantly improving construction, renovation, and finishing work. The product features a green laser beam, which offers greater visibility than traditional red lasers, even in bright rooms or over long distances (up to 40 meters).


Key Features:



  • 360° line range

  • Multiple laser positioning options

  • 4 planes – 16 lines

  • Self-leveling

  • Powerful green beam

  • Easily replaceable battery


Technical Specifications:



  • Manufacturer: Geko

  • Battery: 2x Li-ion 3.7V, 3000 mAh capacity

  • Maximum working range: up to 40 meters

  • Automatic leveling: ≤ 3°

  • Pendulum stabilization time: < 4 seconds

  • Laser class: II

  • Laser wavelength: 505 - 520 nm

  • Beam color: intense green

  • Number of 360° heads: 4 (2 horizontal, 2 vertical)

  • Number of lines/crosses: 16 lines / 10 crosses

  • Slopes with locked pendulum: Yes (enables angled line projection)

  • Remote control: Yes (included, with battery)

  • Mounting threads: 1/4” and 5/8” (compatible with most tripods)

  • Device weight with battery: 615 g

  • Stabilization: Pendulum system with automatic leveling function

  • Dimensions: 14 x 14 x 7 cm


Included in the Set:



  • Geko 4D Laser Level

  • Remote control

  • 2x Li-ion battery

  • Charger

  • Magnetic wall mount with an additional metal plate

  • Protective glasses

  • 1/4” adapter

  • Mini tripod

  • Additional adjustable platform

  • Convenient carrying case with foam padding

  • User manual

description.name: Battery clamp 210x130mm 500A (+)
description.long_desc:
A robust crocodile clamp designed for use with a maximum current of 500A. Intended for jumper cables, it ensures a safe and secure connection when starting vehicles. Made from a durable steel body and equipped with copper inserts, it guarantees excellent current conductivity with minimal energy loss. The insulated red grip indicates the positive terminal (+), allowing for quick and safe polarity identification.


With dimensions of 210x130 mm, the clamp is large enough to provide a secure grip on battery terminals while remaining easy to handle. Its solid construction ensures durability and reliability, even in challenging conditions like low temperatures or intensive use.


Product Features:




  • Maximum Current Capacity: 500A: Provides high efficiency when starting vehicles with a dead battery, ensuring rapid energy delivery.




  • Insulated Grip: Equipped with a red, insulated handle that identifies the positive terminal (+), enhancing safety and preventing accidental short circuits.




  • Steel Body and Copper Inserts: The steel body offers durability and strength, while the copper inserts significantly improve current conductivity, minimizing energy loss and increasing charging efficiency.




  • Dimensions: 210x130 mm: Ideal size for easy handling and a solid grip on battery terminals, even in vehicles with larger batteries.




Applications:




  • Jumper Cables: An essential component of jumper cables, used when starting vehicles with a drained battery.




  • Auto Repair Shops: Perfect for professional use, providing a safe connection when working with batteries.




  • Home Emergencies: Excellent for home garages, ideal for emergency vehicle starts.

description.name: Battery clamp 155x110mm 300A (+)
description.long_desc:
Solidny zacisk krokodylkowy przystosowany do pracy z prądem o natężeniu maksymalnym 300A. Przeznaczony do kabli rozruchowych, zapewnia bezpieczne i pewne połączenie podczas uruchamiania pojazdów. Izolowany chwyt w kolorze czerwonym wskazuje na biegun dodatni (+), co pozwala na szybką i bezpieczną identyfikację biegunowości.

Dzięki wymiarom 155x110 mm, zacisk jest wystarczająco duży, aby zapewnić pewny chwyt na klemach akumulatora, jednocześnie pozostając wygodnym w użyciu. Solidna konstrukcja gwarantuje trwałość i niezawodność nawet w trudnych warunkach, takich jak niskie temperatury czy intensywne użytkowanie.

Cechy produktu:

  • Maksymalne natężenie prądu 300A: Zapewnia wysoką efektywność podczas uruchamiania pojazdów z rozładowanym akumulatorem, gwarantując szybkie dostarczenie energii.

  • Izolowany chwyt: Wyposażony w czerwoną, izolowaną rączkę, która odpowiada za identyfikację bieguna dodatniego (+), co zwiększa bezpieczeństwo użytkowania i zapobiega przypadkowym zwarciom.

  • Wymiary: 155x110 mm: Idealne rozmiary zapewniają łatwe użytkowanie i solidne przyleganie do klem akumulatora, nawet w pojazdach o większych akumulatorach.

Zastosowanie:

  • Kable rozruchowe: Niezbędny element kabli rozruchowych, wykorzystywany przy uruchamianiu pojazdów z rozładowanym akumulatorem.

  • Warsztaty samochodowe: Idealny do użytku profesjonalnego, zapewniając bezpieczne połączenie podczas pracy z akumulatorami.

  • Domowe awarie: Świetnie sprawdzi się w domowym garażu do awaryjnego uruchamiania pojazdów.

description.long_desc:
Solidny zacisk krokodylkowy przystosowany do pracy z prądem o natężeniu maksymalnym 300A. Przeznaczony do kabli rozruchowych, zapewnia bezpieczne i pewne połączenie podczas uruchamiania pojazdów. Izolowany chwyt w kolorze czarnym wskazuje na biegun ujemny (-), co pozwala na szybką i bezpieczną identyfikację biegunowości.

Dzięki wymiarom 155x110 mm, zacisk jest wystarczająco duży, aby zapewnić pewny chwyt na klemach akumulatora, jednocześnie pozostając wygodnym w użyciu. Solidna konstrukcja gwarantuje trwałość i niezawodność nawet w trudnych warunkach, takich jak niskie temperatury czy intensywne użytkowanie.

Cechy produktu:

  • Maksymalne natężenie prądu 300A: Zapewnia wysoką efektywność podczas uruchamiania pojazdów z rozładowanym akumulatorem, gwarantując szybkie dostarczenie energii.

  • Izolowany chwyt: Wyposażony w czarną, izolowaną rączkę, która odpowiada za identyfikację bieguna ujemnego (-), co zwiększa bezpieczeństwo użytkowania i zapobiega przypadkowym zwarciom.

  • Wymiary: 155x110 mm: Idealne rozmiary zapewniają łatwe użytkowanie i solidne przyleganie do klem akumulatora, nawet w pojazdach o większych akumulatorach.

Zastosowanie:

  • Kable rozruchowe: Niezbędny element kabli rozruchowych, wykorzystywany przy uruchamianiu pojazdów z rozładowanym akumulatorem.

  • Warsztaty samochodowe: Idealny do użytku profesjonalnego, zapewniając bezpieczne połączenie podczas pracy z akumulatorami.

  • Domowe awarie: Świetnie sprawdzi się w domowym garażu do awaryjnego uruchamiania pojazdów.

description.name: Booster clamps 400A
description.long_desc:
Durable and sturdy alligator clips designed for a maximum current of 400A. The set includes two pieces:



  • Red – corresponds to the positive terminal (+),

  • Black – corresponds to the negative terminal (-).


Each clip is equipped with copper inserts that ensure excellent conductivity and minimize power loss. With strong clamps and serrated jaws, they securely grip wires and battery terminals, providing stable and reliable connections even under heavy loads.


Technical Specifications:



  • Material: Steel with copper inserts

  • Color: Red (positive), Black (negative)

  • Maximum current load: 400A

  • Length: Approximately 15 cm

  • Weight of the set: Approx. 250 g


Product Features:



  • Maximum current load: 400A – Ideal for both home use and professional workshops, allowing operation with high starting currents.

  • Copper inserts: High-quality copper inserts provide better electrical conductivity, reduce heat generation, and minimize energy losses.

  • Color coding: Red and black – intuitive identification of positive and negative terminals, enhancing work comfort and safety.

  • Strong clamp: Robust springs and precisely crafted jaws ensure a secure grip on wires and battery terminals, eliminating the risk of disconnection during use.

  • Versatile application: Compatible with most booster cables, chargers, workshop devices, and electrical installations.


Applications:



  • Electrical system work

  • Handling automotive and industrial batteries

  • Use with chargers and jump starters

  • Power and booster cables for vehicles and machinery


Advantages:



  • Secure and stable grip: Serrated jaws with strong pressure provide a firm hold, even under challenging conditions.

  • Safe operation: Insulated handles protect against accidental electric shocks.

  • Optimal conductivity: Copper inserts ensure reliability even under high current loads.

  • Durability and reliability: Resistance to mechanical damage and corrosion guarantees a long service life.

description.name: Industrial dehumidifier 50L/24H
description.long_desc:
Industrial Air Dehumidifier 50L/24H – The Perfect Solution for Drying Large Spaces!


Efficient air dehumidification is key to maintaining optimal conditions in warehouses, production halls, offices, or residential buildings. The 50L/24H industrial dehumidifier is a powerful and reliable device designed for demanding users.


Technical Specifications:



  • Power Supply: 220-240 V

  • Frequency: 50 Hz

  • Minimum Operating Temperature: 5°C

  • Maximum Operating Temperature: 38°C

  • Dehumidification Capacity (per day): 50 liters

  • Refrigerant: R290

  • Air Circulation: 560 m3/h

  • Humidity Range: 10-95%

  • Motor Power: 650 W

  • Working Area: 50-120 m2

  • Noise Level: 58 dB

  • IP Protection: IP22

  • Water Tank Capacity: 7 liters


Product Features:


High Dehumidification Performance:


The dehumidifier can remove up to 50 liters of water per day, making it ideal for drying large rooms. It is perfect for use in warehouses, production halls, offices, laundries, or residential buildings, especially in areas affected by moisture or flooding. Its efficiency makes it suitable for spaces ranging from 50 to 120 m2, restoring optimal humidity levels quickly.


Advanced Technical Parameters:


With an air circulation rate of 560 m3/h, the dehumidifier ensures quick and effective moisture removal. It operates within a wide humidity range (10% - 95%), making it suitable for drying freshly finished rooms or long-term use in warehouses and basements. Its ability to function in temperatures from 5°C to 38°C allows it to be used in various climate conditions, making it ideal for construction sites or garages.


Eco-Friendly Refrigerant:


The use of R290 refrigerant ensures compliance with ecological standards while maintaining energy efficiency, which is particularly important for prolonged use. This makes it an excellent choice for renovation companies or workshops that require a reliable daily-use device.


Robust Construction:


The durable housing and built-in 7-liter water tank allow for extended operation without frequent emptying. For intensive use, such as drying after flooding, the included water drainage hose enables continuous operation without interruptions. This makes it ideal for drying walls and floors after renovations, as well as in environments requiring a dry atmosphere, such as archives or rooms with electronic equipment.


Mobility and Ease of Use:


The device is equipped with four wheels, including two swivel wheels with brakes, making it easy to move, even in large spaces. A convenient handle further facilitates transportation, whether in a production hall or on a construction site. This practical solution is also ideal for rental companies, where quick setup and portability are crucial.


Why Choose This Dehumidifier?



  • High Efficiency: Quickly and effectively dehumidifies large areas.

  • Ease of Use: Simple control panel with intuitive features.

  • Mobility: Equipped with wheels and a handle for easy transport.


The 50L/24H industrial air dehumidifier is a professional tool designed to tackle even the toughest drying tasks. Perfect for warehouses, construction sites, and residential applications!

description.name: Metal adjustable spray gun SKY-LINE series
description.long_desc:
Adjustable Metal Garden Spray Gun SKY-LINE – Durability and Comfort in One!


The SKY-LINE Adjustable Metal Garden Spray Gun is a sturdy and convenient tool for watering and cleaning. Equipped with an adjustable nozzle, it allows you to customize the water stream to suit various needs. Its lightweight aluminum body ensures durability, while the non-slip rubberized handle provides comfort and a secure grip. Perfect for garden use, car washing, or patio cleaning.


Product Features:



  • Adjustable Nozzle – Customize the water stream to your needs! From a gentle mist to a powerful jet – the perfect solution for watering plants, washing your car, or cleaning your patio.

  • Durable Aluminum Body – A lightweight yet sturdy construction ensures longevity and resistance to damage.

  • Non-Slip Rubberized Handle – Comfortable to use even during extended work. The ergonomic shape and non-slip coating guarantee a secure grip and ease of operation.

  • The SKY-LINE Garden Spray Gun is a reliable tool for every gardening enthusiast! Its solid construction, easy adjustment, and user-friendly design make watering and cleaning a pleasure.


Key Features:



  • Adjustable nozzle for different water streams

  • Lightweight and durable aluminum construction

  • Non-slip handle for extra comfort

  • Universal connector compatible with standard quick couplings
